Text: Post Closing Survey for Napoleonville Property Cc Gerald Please review the attached letter requesting LRCIs approval of surveyors we desire to use for the post closing survey LRCI has previously approved Miller Engineers Associates This letter requests the additional approval of Hydro Consultants Inc Hydro Consultants was the firm hired by Enron Storage Company to perform their survey in April Please have the letter signed and returned to me at the address below John Florence Fax Phone Reliant Energy Gas Storage LLC P O Box Houston Texas Thank you John LRCI Survey Letter doc LRCI Survey Letter doc
